name: aus-02-medics-to-the-rescue
description: Deliver medicines to a wounded soldier in the 2nd Austrian mission

name: aus-03-artillerie
description: Call in artillery to destroy Romanian armoured car in the 3rd Austrian mission

name: aus-03-heroes
description: Stop the Romanian attack in Transylvania

name: aus-03-austrian-onslaught
description: Do not suffer losses in a counterattack on the barn in the 3rd Austrian mission

name: aus-04-semper-fidelis
description: Save the captives during the night raid in the 4th Austrian mission

name: aus-04-alchemist
description: Cause considerable damage to the enemy using gas shells in the 4th Austrian mission

name: aus-04-steel-cavalry
description: Do not lose an armoured car in the 4th Austrian mission

name: aus-05-ready-battle
description: Repair field gun in the final Austrian mission

name: aus-05-sturmtruppen
description: Capture enemy tank using stormtroopers in the final Austrian mission

name: aus-05-breakthrough
description: Do not lose the truck during retreat in the final Austrian mission

name: aus-win
description: Finish the Austrian campaign

description: For completion of the 1st Austrian mission
